channel.title: CVE Feed for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET Cyber Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ESET, spol. s r.o. -- ESET Cyber Security

item.title: CVE-2021-37850|2024-08-04T01:30:09.156Z -- eset%2C%20spol.%20s%20r.o. -- eset%20cyber%20security
item.description: ESET was made aware of a vulnerability in its consumer and business products for macOS that enables a user logged on to the system to stop the ESET daemon, effectively disabling the protection of the ESET security product until a system reboot.
